pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, July 8, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, July 8, 2017:

Hamburg, Germany

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at a Women Entrepreneur Finance Initiative event.

Hamburg Messe

Note for media:

  • Official photographers and host broadcaster

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G20 Working Session III.

Hamburg Messe

Closed to media.

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of Mexico, Enrique Peña Nieto.

Hamburg Messe

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G20 Working Luncheon – Working Session IV.

Hamburg Messe

Closed to media.

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G20 Concluding Session.

Hamburg Messe

Closed to media.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

International Media Centre, Hall B3
Hamburg Messe

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

9:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will depart Hamburg, Germany for Ottawa, Canada.

Hamburg Airport

Closed to media.

 

Note: all times local
